message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $140 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend. How about $130?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
